product.title: Pink Heart Gold-Plated Asymmetric Stud Earrings | NEW
product.body_html:
The perfect blend of elegance and heartfelt charm

A symbol of love and beauty to add a glimmer to your outfit. These heart-themed earring sets are made from copper and 18K real gold plating. With a light pink/purple stone at the center and small details, this is a set to add to your earring collection.

Exquisitely detailed - these earrings are your ticket to daily enchantment! Each earring is different and will make you stand out! Unique designs set 'em apart, making your ears look oh-so-trendy with a touch of awe.

  • Shape: Heart
  • Metal Type: Copper
  • Material: 18K Real Gold-Plating
  • Category: Earrings (Stud)
  • Package includes: Set of 4 or 5 Earrings
  • Packaging: Earrings do not come with the original box to protect the environment but they do come in a plastic bag. Let's save our planet together from unnecessary waste.
  • Maintenance: 18k gold-plated jewelry will not fade. If the color becomes darker, wash it with soap to restore the brightness.

 

A wonderful gift for your loved ones

Whether you're looking for a thoughtful gift for your partner, a sweet surprise for your sister, or a token of love for your mom, these heart-themed stud earrings are the perfect choice. Representing love, dreams, and the limitless beauty of the night sky, making them a meaningful present for any occasion.

Elevate your jewelry collection today at www.kawaiies.com!
